content: elevate your kitchen decor with the speckle cloud dishcloth set a delightful crochet pattern perfect for advanced beginners this one-piece bottom-up reversible design is worked flat creating two sizes - small at 7 5 x 7 5 and large at 10 x 10 the pattern includes both a written pattern and a video tutorial for easy crafting dive into this project and create functional and stylish dishcloths for your home **unique features-** reversible design with fun scalloped cloud edges includes video tutorial for visual learners two size options written pattern for easy reference **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 - furls streamline https //tidd ly/4l6y8yy yarn universal cotton supreme speckles https //amzn to/44g94bt worsted weight 140 yards notions stitch markers https //amzn to/435nlz8
